mapper.select: select board_no, mem_no, title, crp_ctg, price, qty, rep, reg_date, reg_stts from crops_sale where reg_stts = 'e1' order by reg_date desc

select b.* from (select ROWNUM rn, a.* from (select c.board_no, c.mem_no, c.title, c.crp_ctg, c.price, c.qty, c.rep, c.reg_date, c.reg_stts, r.rev_no, r.rate from crops_sale c left join review r on c.mem_no = r.mem_no
c.reg_stts = 'e1'
and c.crp_ctg = #{category}
and c.title like '%${search}%'
order by c.reg_date desc
order by c.price desc
order by c.price asc
order by r.rate
) a
where ROWNUM <= #{page} * 9) b where b.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 9
